name: flask-express-react
description: A template for web-applications using Flask, Express and React.
author: Niklas Rosenstein <rosensteinniklas@gmail.com>

scripts.api:dev: cross-env FLASK_DEBUG=1 PYTHONPATH=. python -m pyinvoke application.api.main:main
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel application/web -d application/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
